import { Grid, Typography,Card } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { Button, CardActionArea, CardActions } from '@mui/material'; import CardContent from '@mui/material/CardContent'; import CardMedia from '@mui/material/CardMedia'; const data = [ {id:1,name:"Food App",content:"For single restaurants and restaurant chains looking to offer food delivery online, our feature-rich online delivery application is highly customizable and easy to use.",image:'https://humzahalal.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/chicken-Biryani.jpg'}, {id:2,name:"Jewellery App",content:"For single restaurants and restaurant chains looking to offer food delivery online, our feature-rich online delivery application is highly customizable and easy to use.",image:'https://www.siriusjewels.com/uploads/sliders/copy_1SILDER%20APP%20BANNER08.jpg'}, {id:3,name:"Events App",content:"For single restaurants and restaurant chains looking to offer food delivery online, our feature-rich online delivery application is highly customizable and easy to use.",image:'https://www.adobe.com/content/dam/www/us/en/events/overview-page/eventshub_evergreen_opengraph_1200x630_2x.jpg'}, // {name:"Chennai",venue_count:308,image:'https://www.weddingwire.in/assets/img/listing-city/in-chennai-10011065.jpg'}, // {name:"Delhi NCR",venue_count:1773,image:'https://www.weddingwire.in/assets/img/listing-city/in-delhi-ncr-9635.jpg'}, // {name:"Lucknow",venue_count:418,image:'https://www.weddingwire.in/assets/img/listing-city/in-lucknow-10011289.jpg'}, ] function ProductContent() { return (
{data.map((item,index) =>{ // console.log("index",index+1) const value = index+1 console.log("value",value) if (value === value+3) { console.log("index",value) return( {item.name} {item.content} ) } return( {item.name} {item.content} )})}
) } export default ProductContent
